title: Writing Event Based Microservices using Steeltoe
description: In this session see how to create message based microservices using Steeltoe.

title: Use Kubernetes for Modern .NET Apps with Steeltoe and Tye
description: Learn about new Kubernetes features included in Steeltoe 3.0 and use Tye to help develop for K8s.

title: Steeltoe 3.0 is officially available
description: Version 3.0 is packed with messaging, kubernetes support, new ways to implement endpoints, and so much more.

title: Steeltoe 3.0.0-rc1 is now available.
description: This release candidate marks the final developer preview of Steeltoe 3.0. Next stop is the official public release!

title: SpringOne is just around the corner, get your free pass today.
description: The conference will be held virtually September 2-3. Don't miss Steeltoe's session about all things 3.0 as well as the .NET hands-on workshops.

title: Steeltoe 3.0.0-m3 is available
description: The third milestone of Steeltoe 3.0 has been reached! With a focus on .NET Core, this new major version will offer message streaming, the Initializr project, and more.
